name: 2D Action Platform Prototype 2
description:
This is the 2nd iteration of my Unity 2D Prototype (well technically the 3rd, but I lost the 2nd version which was like the 1st version but more fleshed out).

Here you control a player character and try to platform and fight enemies. At the end, there is a Boss fight.

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Aim: Mouse Cursor

Shoot: Left Mouse Button

Quit: Alt+F4
